Question: Lepro Innovation Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LEPRO INNOVATION INC.

Product: B1 AI Smart Light Bulbs

- AI-powered home lighting products
- Elevates the home lighting experience
- Personalized lighting experience based on user emotions, commands, and scenes
- 2.4GHz Wi-FI, Bluetooth connectivity
- Up to 20,000 hours of lifetime
- Two- to five-year warranty on most products
